data.title: Used Electric Lift Tables 24" x 48"
data.meta-description: Used Electric Lift Tables For Sale at American Surplus, 24" x 48" platform, 4,000 lb. capacity, in stock, nationwide shipping, American Mfg, learn more about our used electric lift tables

ul.li: Foot Pedal to Lift and Lower
Foot Pedal to Lift and Lower

long-description.p: Used Electric Lift Tables For Sale at American Surplus are currently in stock. They feature a large 24" x 48" platform for material. These lift tables have a two ton, 4,000 lb. capacity. They are manufactured by American. They have a foot pedal that is electric powered to raise and lower the lift table and material.

p.strong: We can’t list our entire inventory online, if you do not see what you are looking for, just ask! Quantity discounts available on used lift tables 40-60% off the price of new. Call 800-876-3736 for additional information & a free quote. American Surplus will provide a quote on new equipment if used is unavailable. Nationwide shipping is available. Price and product availability subject to change without notice. Inventory is subject to prior sale.
